name: wehavemagnums
text: Last panel makes me guffaw

name: overmedicated
text: This has actually worked for me. Seriously. Onstad, I am indebted to you fine sir.

name: nsrdude
text: I may try this myself.

name: windfish
text: I have tried this and it does not work.

name: hawaiian_robot
text: It really would depend on the lady and the overall situation/context

name: zapatos
text: Maybe you were not stern enough.  It usually works for me, although I do less demanding and more frenching.

name: mustakrakesh
text: I tried it once and I got kicked in the rad chilis

name: zapatos
text: You just walk up to them and start frenching?  Maybe you should stick to frenching potatos, into tastey fries.

name: mustakrakesh
text: Indeed sir, indeed.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Seriously? That is amazing.

name: geysershitdick
text: This DID NOT work for me.

name: spinynorman
text: Reality speaks.

name: bsidestarchild
text: Ray is cool and in control.

name: rowboat
text: Ray has wicked sack goin' round there.

name: ghostd
text: Another epic last panel.

name: jonmw
text: what the hell is that wriggling piece of plywood

name: behka
text: one of my top three strips EVER.

name: chaesar
text: Is it ironic for a cat to have cat eye glasses, or just plain sense?

name: random_shorts
text: I believe that cats refer to them as just "eye glasses"

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: A comment left by everything_is_a_hat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by katsura, Howard, mikejk305)

name: odei
text: I will try this next week. I will be twice as hilarious if it works.

name: zem
text: I'm guessing it didn't work

name: odei
text: I probably meant to type "it". Either that or I forgot maths, because double nothing is still nothing.

name: hurry
text: I love how you replied to each other with 4 month gaps. So, did it work or not?

name: kelsotimebomb
text: The world needs to know!

name: dovey
text:
Dan! Get out here!

French us! Reply to our enquiries!

name: tekende
text: I'm glad I'm the only one in the office right now, because your typo and the ensuing discussion here is making me laugh and cry really hard.

name: tinhand
text:
Ray cuts through the baloney and demands that that woman just stop her shit and start frenching him. If only the world would work that way huh.

Also; Ray does not have a gut in this comic?

name: le_chien_manquee
text: you just try demanding some french action from a chick who hates you without sucking in your gut.  let us all know how you get on.  amateur!

name: tripleg
text: perhaps he's sucking it in?

name: tripleg
text: oh jeez, not only did someone already suggest that, but they beat me by a year . i hang my head in shame.

name: shoinan
text: Make sure your woman knows when she must French with you.

name: tekende
text: She muft French you.

name: overmedicated
text: Until she sizzles, I imagine. Metaphorically.

name: tetrisattack
text: YOU SHOW HER RAY!

name: patkun
text: He's sucking his gut in, clearly. We all do in cases like this, I think.

name: buttermoths
text: At least those of us brave enough to walk around in a thong and glasses and nothing else does.

name: closefriend
text: Ray is out to remind us that the boyz-n-the-hood are always hard.

name: audhumla
text: The perfect follow-up alt text to the comic preceding this one.

name: hypoluxa
text:
I wish I had a wicked enough sack to order my girl to French me.
Damn, Ray.

name: lawbot
text: I actually intend to say that to my fiance the next time I see her.

name: charchar
text: Maybe he's not yelling at the right woman.  He is eyeless, after all.

name: snowman
text: Man, I just legit LOL'ed at this strip.  Amazing.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: RAY SMUCKLES:  HE GETS THINGS DONE.

name: chachibenji
text: Vlad should try this approach sometime, as the King of Makeouts which he claims to be.

name: pzukowski
text: That's a direct order, beeyatch!

name: wurlitzergirl
text:
THE HAIR. THE GLASSES. OH MY GOD TINA LOOKS LIKE ME.

>^..^<

name: wonelove
text:
Get out here!
French me!

name: lawbot
text: I have just been reminded that Let's French were a band in the DC area.

name: dusty
text: I must start a band called "get out here!" and contact them to go on tour together.

name: butta
text: I am giving this a 5 because this is how it should be DONE, Ray! Woo!

name: jhunter
text: sheer class in a glass

name: zapatos
text: Get out there Tina, you know you want it.

name: mikeronomicon
text: No matter how bad Ray fucks up, you gotta love a guy who wears nothing but a thong and drinks martinis all day.
